posts._title: Carl Theodor Dreyer & Jørgen Roos – Et slot i et slot: Krogen og Kronborg AKA The Castle Within the Castle (1954)
posts.title: Et slot i et slot: Krogen og Kronborg
posts.excerpt: Within its walls, Kronborg Castle in Elsinore contains large sections of another, older castle, Krogen, built by Eric of Pomerania around 1420. Discoveries unearthed during the 1926-1935 restoration of Kronborg made it possible to form a picture of Krogen, illustrated in the film by reconstruction models.

posts.excerpt: Tuna fishing. posts.title: The Pawnbroker
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:In a poor neighborhood of New York, the bitter and lonely Jewish pawnbroker Sol Nazerman is a survivor from Auschwitz that has no emotions or feelings. posts.title: The Comedy of Terrors

posts.title: The Terror
